body.name: Interior Car Lights Keepsmile Car Accessories APP Control with Remote Music Sync Color Change RGB Under Dash Car Lighting with Charger 12V LED Lights
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 33 mins
features: DIY Modes: Car led lights has 16 million colors, or custom the colors and adjust the brightness through the smart app's color palette, Let you easily create your own car atmosphere.Perfect for decorating cars for Halloween and Christmas.

Scenario Modes: Led lights for car has 28 dynamic modes for you to choose, or customize the parameters of led strip lights (automatic, flash, jump,fade in and out,brightness adjustment,speed adjustment) Please feel free to use your imagination.
Dynamic Music Sync: The lights of led car light will change in sync with the rhythm of the song or music. Let the lights dance with your music and enhance your driving pleasure.
3 Types Control: The car accessories with 44-key RF remote control and battery and 4-button control box with built-in sensitive microphone and Bluetooth smart APP.

2-Line Design: 1 main line separated into 2 branch lines, as long as the line is hidden under the car mat, without having to worry about exposed wiring or an untidy appearance.the best choice for truck accessories and jeep accessories.

3 Installation Methods: Strong Glue, Screws, Hook and Loop Tape, built-in overvoltage fuse, led interior car lights can adheres very well to different surfaces and very safe,extremely low-heat, touchable.
Gifts for Men and Women: These RGB music car led floor lights always bring joy to him or her, are easy to use, and are a great choice for a birthday gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For Friend: It is now, let's create a car light party together. For Family: Bring your children together to enjoy the fun of intelligent technology For Lovers: Let the colorful lights accompany you and your lover on a romantic trip.

Package Contains Car Cigarette lighter / LED Strip Light / Fuse / RF Remote Control / Hook and Loop Tape / Screws / Cable Ties / User Manuals 3 Installation Method Strong Glue / Screws / Hook and Loop Tape. Compatibility It works on any vehicle that has a 12v power adapter. Also known as the cigarette lighter. Working Temperature -10℃~45℃/(14℉~113℉) Specification: Chips: 5050 SMDInput: AC 100-240V / 50-60HzOutput: DC 12V= 12WPower: Car Cigarette lighterLight strip length: 230mm / (9in)Power cord length: 460mm / 1160mm / 1720mm (18in*45in*64in) Can it be set to automatically come on when you enter the car？ Yes if you leave it plugged in with the power button on, it will power on and off with your car’s ignition and it will keep the color you set last time. How to connect the Smart APP? Scan the QR code on the box to download the smart APPOpen your phone Bluetooth to search for led lights devices, device name format: KSxx-xxxxxxForbid to click the led lights device name directly, they will be connected automatically when you enter the APP.Enter the smart APP, click car light to start your technology journey. They're broken,can I get replacements? Yes,Don't worry, Don't be shy, please tell us that if there is any quality problem with the product, We will help you until you are satisfied. User Guide: Use "cloth" or "paper towel" to clean the surface of the object where the car led lights will be installed.Separate the tape from the backing layer.Paste the led strip lights on the surface of the object and press hard to make it fit more evenly and tightly.The adhesive strength of the glue is related to time, the adhesive strength after the first paste is 40% of its maximum adhesion, and it takes 72 hours to reach the maximum adhesive strength.If you have any question about our product, please go to your Amazon product page "Sold" - "Question".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty plug and play. Some of the double sided tape a little weak, used my own to hold better. Overall like the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lights ever!
reviews.reviewText: I've bought several of these now and installed them in two of my cars, one car got totaled :(, plan to install it in more cars in future as well! Very easy install and the adhesive has held up extremely well as well without having to use the screws and the LEDs are very bright which is nice. Just nice to have stuff like this especially at night so car isn't so dark

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It actually looks good
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I don’t like how it looks in the video. I think it looks stupid flashing but when it is one color in the night so worth it. I did a good job so it is hard to see it is there (had stiff in the box for that) and if you don’t like them just tern them off. The remote is trash I just use the app when I’m letting the truck warm up and I just keep it on red or blue so not that difficult. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I should have taken video of these lights I bought my niece for Christmas! We installed them on Christmas Eve and they are the absolute coolest lights ever! The lights have a remote and they can even light up along with your music! Really cool lights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cool lights but.....
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love the lights. The adhesive is not the best. The back ones I used the velcro and stuck them to the back of the seat which is like a soft velcro so that worked great. The front ones are harder since it's not fabric. Also the control is terrible. It worked once and then never again. Luckily it has buttons attached to the plug but you can't customize it as good as with the control. Highly disappointed in that. The app seems to be sketchy and read many reviews warning to stay away and it doesn't work well so that's disappointing as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lights in a truck
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my boyfriends truck, it looks really cool, the only thing that sucks is there is a wire showing on both sides because it wasn’t long enough for him to hide in his truck, but it will probably in a smaller car or something idk…Also one fell off due to cold weather I’m pretty sure, the glue froze.. I don’t blame that on this company though because Minnesotas weather got to a feels like of -45 over the past week so I’m happy the other 3 stayed on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my brother for Christmas and as soon as he got it, he installed it in his car. Installation was very easy and instructions were very clear. You have multiple color selections and also a disco type setting which is nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super bright, but doesn't stick well.
reviews.reviewText: Don't get me wrong, these lights are really pretty & bright; They light up the whole car at night. The only downside to these is that the adhesive's in the box only stick for about maybe 2 months. These are good for short term use.
